short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Pomodoro Timer that shows remaining time on hover when pinned.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with the Pomodoro Timer extension! This simple yet effective tool helps you manage your time and stay focused by breaking your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes long, separated by short breaks. Whether you're studying, working, or tackling tasks, our timer keeps you on track.

Key Features:
Customizable Timer: Set your desired work session duration to fit your needs.
Visual Countdown: See the remaining time at a glance with a clear and easy-to-read display.
Notifications and Sound Alerts: Get notified and hear a sound when your session is over.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes it easy to start, stop, and reset the timer.
Badge Countdown: View the remaining time directly on the extension icon when the timer is running.
Stay productive and focused with the Pomodoro Timer extension. Try it now and transform your workflow!
